job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: role software engineerltbrgtltbrgtwe are seeking a software engineer who will be responsible for developing and maintaining one of our communitysupported products you will have the exciting challenge of designing and building robust and scalable software using a cuttingedge technology stack as we seek to unlock the value of our music data and modernize our products and user experience the role works as part of an engineering team and assists this team with estimation and prioritization of development efforts participating in architectural planning discussions our engineers tackle highly complex technical challenges in collaboration with our product and design teams to solve for a variety of problems ranging in complexity and scope our engineers have an opportunity to make significant impacts to our architecture and product features as well as our performance and scalability ltbrgtltbrgtneed to haveltbrgtbachelors degree babs from fouryear college or university in mathcomputer science related field or equivalent work experience ltbrgtextensive experience working with production systems troubleshooting performance tuning optimizing refactoring etcltbrgtextensive experience with python and mysqlltbrgtdeep understanding of software engineering processes such as version control build and configuration management automated deployments automated testing etcltbrgtltbrgtnice to haveltbrgt knowledge of javascript react and ecommerce applications would be a plusltbrgt possess knowledge of the functions operation and mission of the businessltbrgt comfort working in an agile software development process that is highly agile and iterativeltbrgt ability to operate by discogs principles ofltbrgt results driven relentlessly pursue our goals and honor our commitmentsltbrgt communication ask questions share observations state factsltbrgt adaptability embrace failure through experiential learning move forwardltbrgt impact contribute to the story of discogs successltbrgtltbrgtinterested please share your resumes to muraliquadrantresourcecom
